name: AppStoreRelease
description: Release an app to TestFlight or the Apple App Store
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Publish to the App Store $(releaseTrack) track

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The TFS/Azure DevOps service connection that specifies the identity used to publish the app.

inputs.name: apiKeyId
inputs.label: App Store Connect API Key ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The key_id of the account used to publish to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: apiKeyIssuerId
inputs.label: App Store Connect API Issuer ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The issuer_id of the account used to publish to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: apitoken
inputs.label: App Store Connect API Key Content (base64-encoded)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The base64-encoded content of the P8 file of the account used to publish to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: apiKeyInHouse
inputs.label: App Store Connect API In House (Enterprise)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether the account used to publish to the Apple App Store is an Enterprise account or not.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Email
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email of the account used to publish to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password of the account used to publish to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: isTwoFactorAuth
inputs.label: Use Two-step Verification (Two-factor Authentication)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if the Apple account above has two-step verification enabled. (See: https://appleid.apple.com/account/manage -> Security)

inputs.name: appSpecificPassword
inputs.label: App-specific Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The supplementary Apple-supplied password used with two-step verification enabled (See: https://appleid.apple.com/account/manage -> Security -> App-specific Passwords). Use a new variable with its lock enabled on the Variables tab to encrypt this value.

inputs.name: fastlaneSession
inputs.label: Fastlane Session for Two-step Verification
inputs.helpMarkDown: Used with two-step verification.  Create by running: 'fastlane spaceauth -u [email]'

inputs.name: distributeOnly
inputs.label: Distribute a previously uploaded binary to External Testers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Distribute a previously uploaded binary to Apple TestFlight. Add groups to the build. All testers in these groups will have access to this build.

inputs.name: appIdentifier
inputs.label: Bundle ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique app identifier (e.g. com.myapp.etc). Required if the track is Production or 'Distribute a previously uploaded binary' is selected

inputs.name: appType
inputs.label: Application Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of application you wish to submit

inputs.name: ipaPath
inputs.label: Binary Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the binary to publish (i.e. IPA or PKG). A glob pattern can be used but it must resolve to exactly one IPA or PKG file.

inputs.name: skipBinaryUpload
inputs.label: Skip Binary Upload
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to skip binary upload and only update metadata and screenshots. Please note that with enabling this option you also need to pass --description or --pkg as additional fastlane parameters.

inputs.name: uploadMetadata
inputs.label: Upload Metadata
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to upload app metadata to the Apple App Store (e.g. title, description, changelog).

inputs.name: metadataPath
inputs.label: Metadata Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the metadata to publish.

inputs.name: uploadScreenshots
inputs.label: Upload Screenshots
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to upload screenshots of the app to the Apple App Store.

inputs.name: screenshotsPath
inputs.label: Screenshots Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the screenshots to publish.

inputs.name: shouldSubmitForReview
inputs.label: Submit for Review
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to automatically submit the new app version for review after the upload is completed.

inputs.name: shouldAutoRelease
inputs.label: Release Automatically
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to automatically release the app once it is approved.

inputs.name: appBuildNumber
inputs.label: Build Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: The build number of the application build to distribute. If the build number is not specified, the most recent build is distributed.

inputs.name: releaseNotes
inputs.label: What to Test?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file containing notes on what to test for this release.

inputs.name: shouldSkipWaitingForProcessing
inputs.label: Skip Build Processing Wait
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to skip waiting for the Apple App Store to finish processing the build.

inputs.name: shouldSkipSubmission
inputs.label: Skip Submission
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to upload the IPA but not distribute it to testers.

inputs.name: distributedToExternalTesters
inputs.label: Distribute to External Testers
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to distribute the build to external testers (cannot be used with 'Skip Build Processing Wait' and 'Skip Submission').  Using this option requires setting release notes in 'What to Test?'

inputs.name: externalTestersGroups
inputs.label: Groups
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally specify the group(s) of external testers this build should be distributed to. All testers in these groups will have access to this build. To specify multiple groups, separate group names by commas e.g. 'External Beta Testers,TestVendors'. If not specified the default 'External Testers' is used.

inputs.name: appSpecificId
inputs.label: App Specific Apple Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Specific Apple Id: this value should be taken from Apple ID property in the App Information section in App Store Connect

inputs.name: teamId
inputs.label: Team ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of your team if you are in multiple teams.

inputs.name: teamName
inputs.label: Team Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of your team if you are in multiple teams.

inputs.name: installFastlane
inputs.label: Install fastlane
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to install a version of the fastlane tools.  Uncheck if your build machine already has the version of fastlane to use.

inputs.name: fastlaneToolsVersion
inputs.label: fastlane Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose to install either the lastest version of fastlane or a specific version.

inputs.name: fastlaneToolsSpecificVersion
inputs.label: fastlane Specific Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the version of fastlane to install (e.g., 2.15.1).  If a specific version of fastlane is installed, all previously installed versions will be uninstalled beforehand.

inputs.name: fastlaneArguments
inputs.label: Additional fastlane arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Any additional arguments to pass to the fastlane command.

messages.DarwinOnly: The Apple App Store Release task can only run on a Mac computer.
messages.UninstallFastlaneFailed: There were errors when trying to uninstall fastlane. Review the error and if required add a script to your pipeline to cleanly uninstall fastlane prior to running this task. Uninstall error: %s
messages.NoIpaFilesFound: No IPA file found using pattern: %s
messages.MultipleIpaFilesFound: More than one IPA file found using pattern: %s
messages.FastlaneSessionEmpty: 'Fastlane Session' is not set in the service connection configured for two-step verification.
messages.ReleaseNotesRequiredForExternalTesting: 'What to Test?' is required when using 'Distribute to External Testers'.
messages.ExternalTestersCannotSkipWarning: 'Skip Build Processing Wait' and 'Skip Submission' is not supported with 'Distribute to External Testers'. Please check your build configuration.
messages.NotValidAppType: An incorrect ApplicationType was chosen. Valid values iOS, macOS or tvOS. Value set: %s
messages.IpaPathNotSpecified: You need to specify ipaPath - since skipBinaryUpload = false
messages.SessionAndAppIdNotSet: Your fastlane session is incorrect and app specific id is not set. Please set correct fastlane session or app specific id
messages.ReleaseNotesRequiresFastlaneSession: You specified releaseNotes - so you need to provide fastlane session, app specific password only won't work
messages.PrecheckInAppPurchasesDisabled: Precheck will not check In-app purchases because Fastlane doesn't support it with the App Store Connect API Key.
